channel.title: Hindcast on Lixin Qu
channel.description: Recent content in Hindcast on Lixin Qu

item.title: Northern South China Sea Hindcast
item.description: The hindcast is based on the Regional Ocean Modeling System (ROMS). The model domain covers the entire Pearl River region and the northern shelf of South China Sea with a resolution of 1800m in the horizontal (white lines in the figure above mark every 10 grid spaces) and 30 layers in the vertical. The water depth ranges from 5m to more than 3000m. The hindcast mode is initialized on January 1, 2007 and run to present, with the initial and open boundary conditions created from the Copernicus - Marine environment monitoring service.
